Title: Relic Rustler
Description:
A group of mean, scaly uplanders moved in near the old titan ruins south of Loamm and started tearing the place apart.

Rude, but they're sure to have uncovered all sorts of ancient titan scraps. And that stuff is almost always magic in some way.

Grab some and go see what Dustmonger Topuiz back in Loamm can make of it!
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the supplies to Dustmonger Topuiz in Loamm.
